profile.mini-desc: Passionate about creating solutions that combine technology and design, I always seek to evolve, learn, and add real value to each project.

content.selectFile: Select a file to view it here.

items: Delivered UI improvements from design discussions to production.
Built API endpoints and processed data with Python and FastAPI.
Built an internal CLI for a custom library using Commander, Zod, Prompts, and Chalk to streamline development workflows.
Designed and maintained SQL and NoSQL schemas using PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
Implemented backend APIs in Java for an internal inventory control system.
Developed and maintained React components and user flows.
Supported onboarding and integration of new team members.
Planning and development of a Java (Spring)/Angular.js application.
Creation of Python scripts to automate manual processes.
Maintenance and enhancement of a Java/Angular.js application.
Creation of a loan simulator with React and TypeScript.
Participation in an internal project named "LabsIdeas."

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.desc: Hi, I'm Andrew MartÃ­nez, a full-stack developer with over 4 years of experience. I specialize in building custom solutions that balance efficiency, quality, and best practices. I'm passionate about technical challenges, learning new technologies, and adding real value to every project.
technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vite, HTML, CSS

readme.title: About This Portfolio
readme.intro: Welcome to my personal portfolio, a space I use as a lab to experiment with modern web technologies while showcasing my projects and skills. It's constantly evolving and not 100% finished yet.
status: Resume and Simplified views will be added soon.
Custom theme uses a neon palette that reflects my personal taste, so it might not suit all styles.
You'll find falling joysticks on both the 404 and Coming Soon pages as a small Easter egg.
readme.goalIntro: This portfolio serves two main purposes:
goals: Showcase my full-stack skills (React, Node.js, Java, Pythonâ€¦) and good practices (Clean Code, accessibility, testing, clean architecture).
Act as a presentation card for potential employers and clients, showing real projects with demos and source links.
next: Add real content to the Resume and Simplified views.
Improve responsive experience on mobile and tablets.
Deploy to a custom domain and share it on my profile.
readme.outro: Thanks for visiting! If you see something I can improve, feel free to contact me.

tictactoe.title: Tic-Tac-Toe with AI
tictactoe.description: Classic Tic-Tac-Toe game with local 2-player mode and AI mode with two difficulty levels. The AI uses a pruning algorithm to play strategically: in easy mode, it makes intentional mistakes to allow human victories, and in hard mode, it plays optimally (only draws).
features: State management with Context API and React Providers.
Optimized with pnpm for faster development.

carwash.title: CarFlash â€“ Landing Page for a Car Wash
carwash.description: Modern and responsive landing page for a fictional car wash, built with Astro. Features simple navigation, smooth scrolling, and a clean design, highlighting a high-performance static architecture.
features: Clear navigation and clean visual structure.

comingSoon.title: Coming soon
comingSoon.description: I'm working on something amazing. Come back soon to see it!
